results.description: Real Mallorca promoted to La Liga by coming back to beat Deportivo La Coruna 3-2 on aggregate, as 18-time Grand Slam champion Rafael Nadal looks on.
results.shortTitle: Real Mallorca win promotion to La Liga
results.title: Rafael Nadal watches as Mallorca come back to win La Liga promotion

results.description: Newcastle sign Switzerland defender Fabian Schar from Spanish side Deportivo La Coruna on a three-year deal.
results.title: Fabian Schar: Newcastle sign Switzerland defender from Deportivo

results.description: Brighton agree to sign Deportivo La Coruna striker Florin Andone on a five-year deal.
results.title: Brighton: Striker Florin Andone to join from Deportivo on five-year deal

results.description: Lionel Messi's 46th career hat-trick helps Barcelona beat Deportivo La Coruna to win La Liga for the 25th time.
results.title: Deportivo La Coruna 2-4 Barcelona

results.description: Live text commentary as Barcelona travel to face Deportivo needing just a point to clinch the La Liga crown.
results.shortTitle: Deportivo v Barcelona - Barca win to clinch title
results.title: La Liga live: Deportivo La Coruna v Barcelona

results.description: Atletico Madrid will go into next Sunday's derby at Real Madrid four points above neighbours after beating Deportivo La Coruna.
results.title: Atlético Madrid 1-0 Deportivo La Coruña

thumbnail.altText: Atletico Madrid's players celebrate scoring against Deportivo La Coruna

results.description: Ghana midfielder Sulley Muntari inks a deal with Deportivo La Coruna until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Deportivo La Coruna sign Ghana's Muntari
results.title: Sulley Muntari: Deportivo La Coruna sign Ghanaian midfielder

thumbnail.altText: Former AC Milan midfielder Sulley Muntari extends his stay in Spain

results.description: Deportivo La Coruna name former Real Madrid and Netherlands midfielder Clarence Seedorf as their third boss of the season.
results.title: Clarence Seedorf: Deportivo La Coruna hire Dutchman as manager

results.description: Deportivo La Coruna are looking for their third manager of the season after sacking coach Cristobal Parralo with the club in La Liga's bottom three.
results.shortTitle: La Liga strugglers Depor sack coach Parralo
results.title: Deportivo La Coruna sack coach Cristobal Parralo with club in bottom three

results.description: Gareth Bale and Cristiano Ronaldo score twice as Real Madrid return to winning ways in La Liga with victory against Deportivo La Coruna.
results.title: Real Madrid 7-1 Deportivo La Coruna

results.description: Gareth Bale and Cristiano Ronaldo both score twice as Real Madrid get back to winning ways in La Liga.
results.title: Real Madrid 7-1 Deportivo - Bale and Ronaldo star for superb Real

results.description: Luis Suarez and Paulinho both score twice as Barcelona beat Deportivo La Coruna to go six points clear at the top of La Liga.

results.description: Barcelona v Deportivo La Coruna in La Liga - follow live text coverage as Barcelona look to go six points clear at the top.
results.title: La Liga: Barcelona v Deportivo La Coruna

results.description: Manchester City's bid to sign Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez ends after the Gunners fail to secure a replacement.
results.shortTitle: Man City end pursuit of Arsenal's Sanchez
results.title: Alexis Sanchez: Manchester City accept defeat in Arsenal striker pursuit

results.description: Follow live text coverage as Real Madrid begin their La Liga campaign and Neymar scores on his home debut for PSG.
results.title: Bale scores in Real Madrid opener

results.description: Barcelona's La Liga title hopes are hit as they follow their win over Paris St-Germain with a defeat at Deportivo La Coruna.

results.description: Follow live updates, images & social media reaction as Real Madrid secure a club-record 35th game unbeaten in dramatic style at the Bernabeu.

results.description: Former Liverpool striker Iago Aspas scores twice as Celta Vigo easily beat Deportivo La Coruna in the Galician derby.
results.title: Celta Vigo 4-1 Deportivo La Coruna

results.description: Lionel Messi marks his return from injury with a goal as Barcelona beat Deportivo La Coruna 4-0 at the Nou Camp.
